29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

125435.name: Tracks of Destiny
125435.lore: Your victory is secured by countless failures, and the small steps you have taken led you to the turning point of fate.

409960.name: Traveler's Guide
409960.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>20,000</nobr> Character EXP.
409960.lore:
Required reading for world exploration. Press the "Read" button to tune in to an attractive voice in a language you understand, telling you about the legendary encounters of renowned adventurers across different worlds as well as the precious wisdom and knowledge that they have gathered.

"All-new series of the Traveler's Guide, The Chef's Manual to Galactic Cuisine, is now available for purchase."
"For submissions, please connect to synesthesia beacon ERD-23θ to contact an Intelligentsia Guild representative. Method of payment can be arranged to your convenience."

409961.name: Adventure Log
409961.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>5000</nobr> Character EXP.
409961.lore:
A neatly organized collection of educational adventure notes containing countless illustrations and texts entailing adventures from beginning to end, as well as valuable information and survival-related techniques.

"Why not just digitize it and save it on a photolith disk? That'd be much more convenient."
"Advanced technology is far more fragile than you'd think when faced with stellar storms and neuron flow eruptions. Besides, I'm sure the author of this book wanted people to read it in the simplest of ways."

409962.name: Travel Encounters
409962.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>1000</nobr> Character EXP.
409962.lore:
A travel diary with messy handwriting and random content. It's not of much use to you.

"Dan Heng, hurry up and finish reading it so you can throw it away."

554722.name: Daythunder Anamnesis
554722.lore:
When the child of humanity drank of the crystal core, they lost the gift to sense human hearts. From then onward, their only purpose was to watch over the earth, bound to endless cycles of stars and moons.
They continued to cherish life, yet could no longer perceive neighbors as living beings.

"Prostrate upon the earth, longing for the touch of blue skies. Yet, once soaring high, the humble fragrance of grass is beyond all price..."
comeFrom: Echo of War: "Fortress of Dome" Eye of Twilight

3276614.name: Echoing Wail
3276614.desc: A fractured carapace from black tide creatures. Normal material used for enhancement.
3276614.lore:
Grotesque heads roar, ragged blades keen enough to sunder all, while the genesis of the scourge still lurks, veiled in the shadows and shrouded by the mists of death.

"Why do you lament alone at the gravestone?"
comeFrom: Black Tide Creatures at Equilibrium Level 2 or higher

3517880.name: Ethereal Omen
3517880.desc: A fragment dropped by black tide creatures. Crude material used for enhancement.
3517880.lore:
Misfortune often creeps in quietly, and by the time you perceive it, it has already swelled into a calamity that engulfs the world.

"The death knell sounds at destiny's cessation."

3526997.name: Eternal Lament
3526997.desc: A crystal born from the demise of black tide creatures. Advanced material used for enhancement.
3526997.lore:
Born of the void and destined to return to the void. A contorted existence wrought by decay, fated to wander the desolate earth purposelessly.

"Its life is one of ruin and sorrow."
comeFrom: Black Tide Creature at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher

6471577.name: Seedling of Manas
6471577.desc: Memory's cells extract thoughts, propagating in the heart of the inscriber. Used to level up Traces moderately for Remembrance characters.
6471577.lore:
The seeds take root and sprout. Branches and buds weave together, transmitting signals like a living network of synapses. Over the passage of years, some wither and fade, while others flourish, growing strong enough to bear life and form the vessel of a soul.

"We did not abandon the flesh. We merely transformed it into something... more enduring."

6720910.name: Flower of Ālaya
6720910.desc: This is another form for life to exist and a substance that the universe cannot forget. Used to level up Traces significantly for Remembrance characters.
6720910.lore:
It matures. It becomes a web that constrains history, a blossom from the past. Life is its flower bed or its pistil. If you become the pistil, then you remember the universe and the universe remembers you. You are memory.

"Memory is the true form of all things, thus there is no creation or annihilation in the Anāśrava pure land."

6744567.name: Bīja of Consciousness
6744567.desc: Consciousness fuses with matter, giving rise to the embryo of memory. Used to level up Traces slightly for Remembrance characters.
6744567.lore:
This thing does not truly exist until you see, hear, or sense something. This existence born from sensations soon falls silent, buried in the soil of thought — it may sprout one day, or it may not.

"Such is the substance that forms our bodies, existing because you remember."

29909894.name: Sea Siren's Torn Fin
29909894.desc: Lady of Crashing Waves's spiny tail fin. Can be used for the Ascension of Ice characters.
29909894.lore:
The daughters of the sea once had plump, long tails that glowed in the night, guiding lost fishermen home like lighthouses. Now, those fins have turned to bone spikes, piercing through the very chests they once protected.

"The mad waves of the Skiana Sea can reach a thousand meters high. The ocean is no gentle mother."

ranks.name: Sleep Tight, the Night Dreams Long
ranks.descHash: When Evernight is on the field, if there are (4 or more)/3/2/1 enemy targets on the field, ally memosprites deal DMG equal to <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>/<nobr>#2[i]%</nobr>/<nobr>#3[i]%</nobr>/<nobr>#4[i]%</nobr> of their original DMG respectively.

ranks.name: Listen Up, the Slumber Speaks Soft
ranks.descHash: Increases Evernight's and the memosprite Evey's CRIT DMG by <nobr>#3[i]%</nobr>. Each time Evernight gains "Memoria," increases the amount of "Memoria" gain by <nobr>#1[i]</nobr> point(s). When using Ultimate, additionally gains <nobr>#2[i]</nobr> Charge for "Darkest Riddle."

ranks.name: Fear Not, the Nightmare Lies Past
ranks.descHash:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.
Memosprite Talent Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

ranks.name: Wake Up, the Tomorrow is Yours
ranks.descHash: While Evernight is on the field, ally memosprites' Weakness Break Efficiency increases by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>, and the memosprite Evey's Weakness Break Efficiency additionally increases by <nobr>#2[i]%</nobr>.

ranks.name: Let Go, the "Me" in Memories
ranks.descHash:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Memosprite Skill Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

ranks.name: Like This, Always
ranks.descHash: While Evernight is on the field, all ally targets' All-Type <u>RES PEN</u> increases by <nobr>#2[i]%</nobr>. After the memosprite Evey uses "Dream, Dissolving, as Dew," Evernight gains <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> of the amount of "Memoria" consumed in this attack.

skills.descHash: Deals Ice DMG equal to #1[i]% of Evernight's Max HP to one designated enemy.
skills.name: Time Thence Blurs

skills.descHash: Consumes #6[i]% of Evernight's current HP to summon memosprite Evey and increases CRIT DMG of all ally memosprites by an amount equal to #1[i]% of Evernight's CRIT DMG for #2[i] turn(s). This duration decreases by 1 at the start of Evernight's every turn. If Evey is already on the field, restores its HP by #4[i]% of its Max HP. When using this, gains #3[i] point(s) of "Memoria." If in the "Darkest Riddle" state, gains #5[i] additional point(s) of "Memoria."
skills.name: Day Gently Slips

skills.descHash: Summons memosprite Evey. Then Evey deals Ice DMG to all enemies equal to #1[i]% of Evey's Max HP and Evernight enters the "Darkest Riddle" state. During this state, all enemies take #4[i]% increased DMG while both Evernight and Evey deal #3[i]% increased DMG and are immune to Crowd Control debuffs. Gains #2[i] point(s) of Charge for "Darkest Riddle." And Evey consumes 1 point after it uses "Dream, Dissolving, as Dew." At the start of Evernight's turn, if no Charge remains, exits the "Darkest Riddle" state.
skills.name: O Wakeful World, Goodnight

skills.descHash:
When entering combat, summons memosprite Evey. Evey has an initial SPD of #4[i] and its Max HP equals to #5[i]% of that of Evernight's. Each time Evernight or Evey loses HP, increases CRIT DMG for Evernight and Evey by #2[i]% for #3[i] turn(s), and gains #1[i] "Memoria." This effect can trigger only once per target for each received attack.
When Evernight has #6[i] or more points of "Memoria," dispels Crowd Control debuffs and becomes immune to them. If Evey is on the field, it immediately takes action. The immediate action effect can only trigger again after Evey uses "Dream, Dissolving, as Dew."
skills.name: With Me, This Night

skills.descHash: Attacks an enemy, and after the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.
skills.name: Attack

skills.descHash: After using Technique, at the start of the next battle, obtains the same effect as the one from Skill that increases CRIT DMG for all ally memosprites, and gains <nobr>#1[i]</nobr> "Memoria."
skills.name: Let it Rain Cold On Thee

embedBonusSkill.descHash: Increases Evernight's and the memosprite Evey's CRIT Rate by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>. When using an ability, consumes <nobr>#2[i]%</nobr> of this unit's current HP to increase CRIT DMG for both of them by <nobr>#3[i]%</nobr>, lasting for <nobr>#4[i]</nobr> turn(s). After Evey uses "Dream, Dissolving, as Dew," recovers 1 Skill Point for allies.
embedBonusSkill.name: Dark the Night, Still the Moon

embedBonusSkill.descHash: When combat starts, Evernight regenerates <nobr>#2[i]</nobr> Energy and gains <nobr>#3[i]</nobr> "Memoria." When Evernight or an ally memosprite uses an ability, Evernight regenerates <nobr>#4[i]</nobr> Energy and gains <nobr>#1[i]</nobr> "Memoria."
embedBonusSkill.name: Rouse the Flame, Lull the Light

embedBonusSkill.descHash: When there are 1/2/3/(4 or more) Remembrance characters in the team, increases CRIT DMG for all ally memosprites by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>/<nobr>#2[i]%</nobr>/<nobr>#3[i]%</nobr>/<nobr>#4[i]%</nobr> respectively while Evernight's Skill lasts.
embedBonusSkill.name: Kindle the Morn, Drop the Rain

voiceItems.title: First Meeting
voiceItems.text: The third month of Amphoreus is the month reserved for the Veil of Evernight... So, please place me into your memory using the name "Evernight." If we can hide in the cracks of time, then we'll still have countless moments that belong to us.

voiceItems.title: Greeting
voiceItems.text: A fateful encounter, wouldn't you say?

voiceItems.title: Parting
voiceItems.text: See you! And by that, I mean... see you at the right time.

voiceItems.title: About Self: "Evernight"
voiceItems.text: I am the forgotten past, the evernight that accompanies "her." I shall bear the burden of her cruel past, and I will guard her path forward... at any cost.

voiceItems.title: About Self: "March 7th"
voiceItems.text: "March 7th." What a wonderful, adorable, lively, and interesting name, with a hint of birthday sweetness. Then, she should also like the title "Evernight"...

voiceItems.title: About Self: Experiences
voiceItems.text: March arrived at Amphoreus's temporal coordinates long before you all did. She has already gone out like a candle, but I am that candle's lingering shadow, hidden in the folds of time, awaiting your arrival.

voiceItems.title: Chat: Rosy Celestial Maiden
voiceItems.text: Have you heard the legend of the "Rosy Celestial Maiden"? Mmm, I'm quite pleased~ Who wouldn't love the Rosy Celestial Maiden?

voiceItems.title: Chat: Oronyx
voiceItems.text: They once kept calling for us, yearning for us... They, too, lost themselves in the endless recurrences, within time's inescapable dream... To be a shadow of memory, forced to endure its shifts and disappearances, yet never able to create new ones of your own... I know that terrifying feeling.

voiceItems.title: Chat: Photos
voiceItems.text: An overexposed photo is like spoiled juice. No matter how wonderful it once was, you can only throw it away.

voiceItems.title: Hobbies: Umbrella
voiceItems.text: Why do I always carry an umbrella? Because good memories are like endless rain, falling on umbrellas only to slide off without a trace... Of course, posing with an umbrella also looks good in photos.

voiceItems.title: Annoyances
voiceItems.text: I'm so jealous that you get to chat with her all the time.

voiceItems.title: Share
voiceItems.text: Amphoreus, a jewel forged in tragedy. Its defiant brilliance, daring to rival the divine, drew in thieves who covet memory. Yet in the scarred years of "Time," I hear a longing... for "Oblivion."

voiceItems.title: Knowledge
voiceItems.text: I've imagined many futures for "March 7th." A Mirror Holder of the Beauty, a Ranger of the Hunt, or even a Lord Ravager of the Destruction... But in the end, each of these are drawn from "memories" already known. She, however... always finds a way to surprise me.

voiceItems.title: About Trailblazer
voiceItems.text: What would happen if the power of the Stellaron were to be unleashed...? Would you return to the "past"? Or would you reclaim your "memories"? Curious indeed.

voiceItems.title: About Dan Heng
voiceItems.text: The days spent traveling with you all have already left an indelible mark on him.

voiceItems.title: About March 7th
voiceItems.text: The best future for her would be when I can completely disappear.

voiceItems.title: About Cyrene 1
voiceItems.text: Remember this eternal truth: Girls with pink hair are never to be underestimated.

voiceItems.title: About Black Swan
voiceItems.text: I can count on one hand the number of Memokeepers who've kept their cool in front of me. Could it be that... she's seen something even more terrifying?

voiceItems.title: About Aglaea
voiceItems.text: Such a talented tailor should have woven more memories for Amphoreus. If it were me, I would certainly feel regret for not being able to witness Amphoreus's future with my own eyes.

voiceItems.title: About Tribbie
voiceItems.text: "See you tomorrow," such a simple yet luxurious wish for anyone.

voiceItems.title: About Mydei
voiceItems.text: Whether as a crown prince or as a warrior, he carries too many memories of hatred. Yet when fulfilling his duties, he never confuses the past with the future.

voiceItems.title: About Castorice
voiceItems.text: Would the sea of flowers she planted survive a baptism from the Rain of Sensation?

voiceItems.title: About Anaxa
voiceItems.text: I've always wanted to ask him this question: "If a dromas and the truth of the world both fell into the sea, which one would you save first?"

voiceItems.title: About Hyacine
voiceItems.text: Sunny weather is irritating, but I must admit, the light she casts is soft and comfortable even for me.

voiceItems.title: About Cipher
voiceItems.text: A beautiful lie is indeed better than a thousand cruel truths.

voiceItems.title: About Phainon
voiceItems.text: He sets out from a blank starting point in every recurrence, yet always ends up at the same finale. Will mine and March 7th's fate be any different?

voiceItems.title: About Cerydra
voiceItems.text: Being able to take down that "genius" just shows you can't underestimate people who are good at games of wit... If I ever get the chance, I'd love to test my wits against her.

voiceItems.title: About Hysilens
voiceItems.text: She's like a beautiful bubble. Even when it bursts, it resonates like a trembling note on a string, moving hearts all the same.

voiceItems.title: About Welt
voiceItems.text: I can see it. The heroic fire from the past still burns in his heart. Having such an experienced senior to guide the way makes me feel much more at ease.

voiceItems.title: About Himeko
voiceItems.text: Mature, elegant, fragrant like a rose... March has been working hard to learn from her. As the Express ventures into deeper starry skies, how will Himeko bloom in the future?

voiceItems.title: About Pom-Pom
voiceItems.text: I really want to pet them. But alas, this mysterious "Conductor" doesn't look like they'd take kindly to it.

voiceItems.title: About Terravox
voiceItems.text: What makes life eternal? Memories? No, memory can only preserve a decaying past. Yet they willingly became the cornerstone for the future, leaving behind a legacy that will endure for generations.
voiceItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing the Trailblaze Mission "Gods, Sound the Anthem of Creation"

voiceItems.title: About Cyrene 2
voiceItems.text: I hope this unexpected "rain" I bring can make this barren time bloom... into the hundreds of flowers she once dreamed of ♭
voiceItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing the Trailblaze Mission "Gods, Sound the Anthem of Creation"

voiceItems.title: Eidolon Activation
voiceItems.text: When you gaze into the past, the past gazes back at you.

voiceItems.title: Character Ascension
voiceItems.text: The seeds of memories shall sprout in the rain.

voiceItems.title: Max Level Reached
voiceItems.text: Those brilliant flowers are newborn dreams.

voiceItems.title: Trace Activation
voiceItems.text: Every road we walk deserves a little souvenir~

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Trailblazer
voiceItems.text: Hmm, they ran into us. Too bad for them.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With March 7th (Preservation)
voiceItems.text: It's great to see you again.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With March 7th (The Hunt)
voiceItems.text: Ooh... Xianzhou attire. I'd love to try it on, too ♭

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Dan Heng
voiceItems.text: Trust me, I'll keep your companions safe.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae
voiceItems.text: Looks like we've got some tough enemies to deal with, huh?

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Himeko
voiceItems.text: Oh~ It's big sis Himeko, the one March thinks is totally the best!

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Welt
voiceItems.text: Mr. Yang is indeed very reliable.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Sunday
voiceItems.text: It's not bad to listen to the Harmony's melodies once in a while.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Black Swan
voiceItems.text: I think the upcoming memories... are going to be quite thrilling ♭

voiceItems.title: Battle Begins: Weakness Break
voiceItems.text: Not thinking of running, are you?

voiceItems.title: Battle Begins: Danger Alert
voiceItems.text: You'll quiet down real soon~

voiceItems.title: Turn Begins 1
voiceItems.text: Come on. Stop messing around.

voiceItems.title: Turn Begins 2
voiceItems.text: The evernight draws near. Time for some sweet dreams ♭

voiceItems.title: Turn Idling
voiceItems.text: Stop stressing... You have me, don't you?

voiceItems.title: Basic ATK
voiceItems.text: You'd better remember this~

voiceItems.title: Skill 1
voiceItems.text: Go on. Treat our guests nicely~

voiceItems.title: Skill 2
voiceItems.text: Be good now... It's your time to shine~

voiceItems.title: Hit by Light Attack
voiceItems.text: Ouch...

voiceItems.title: Hit by Heavy Attack
voiceItems.text: That's mean...

voiceItems.title: Ultimate: Activate
voiceItems.text: Don't worry... Just close your eyes...

voiceItems.title: Ultimate: Unleash
voiceItems.text: The night will soon fall... Shh. Good night.

voiceItems.title: Talent 1
voiceItems.text: Rise and shine. Time to wake up~

voiceItems.title: Talent 2
voiceItems.text: Until we meet again, everyone~

voiceItems.title: Downed
voiceItems.text: Couldn't... protect...

voiceItems.title: Return to Battle
voiceItems.text: I don't want to let go yet.

voiceItems.title: Health Recovery
voiceItems.text: Next time it rains... I'll be there, umbrella in hand~

voiceItems.title: Technique
voiceItems.text: Play nice~

voiceItems.title: Battle Won
voiceItems.text: All in all... not a bad memory.

voiceItems.title: Treasure Opening 1
voiceItems.text: How does this compare to the ones you've seen before?

voiceItems.title: Treasure Opening 2
voiceItems.text: Wanna take some pictures?

voiceItems.title: Precious Treasure Opening
voiceItems.text: Shiny things? She'll love it.

voiceItems.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 1
voiceItems.text: This... might be more my thing.

voiceItems.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 2
voiceItems.text: Nothing's changed, huh? Just like always.

voiceItems.title: Enemy Target Found
voiceItems.text: Talk about ruining the mood.

voiceItems.title: Returning to Town
voiceItems.text: When we get back, let's not leave March 7th out of the loop, alright?

storyItems.title: Character Details
storyItems.text:
In the Memory Zone secluded from the world, candlelight reflects the past, silently extinguishing in the mist.
Evernight, child of Remembrance emerging from those shadows, the Chrysos Heir who conceals the Coreflame of "Time," raises the waves of "Oblivion" to protect the wishes of those in the mirror
"Don't worry, I will guard the path of Trailblaze for you... at any cost. ♭"

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part I
storyItems.text:
"Dear March 7th,

Meeting you is like seeing the first light of dawn, filling me with anticipation.
Perhaps I was too eager, appearing before you like this, but thankfully the pheromones made you dismiss it as just an illusion.

The last time we were this close was when you tried to explore the past. Compared to then, you seem to have grown a bit more.
You and your companions—Trailblazer, Dan Heng, Himeko, Welt, and that knightly friend—fought together as one... Even I had to put in a bit of effort against such a formidable opponent ♭

Memory is such a wondrous thing... Before you knew it, your journey had already come this far.

I still remember countless greedy eyes glinting behind the starlit trails, peering at this body, coveting this secret.
Even though I could tear through the hunters' web, the prismatic light of the Garden always chased behind me... Any rain or tears would evaporate into a vacuum against that luminescence.

But where can I escape from "the past"... escape from "myself"?
Is it in those emotionless specimens, in the elusive Beauty?
Is it in The Hunt that forever prowls, yet never finds its way home?
Or in Destruction, where blood and tears intertwine, despised by all?
...

Until a blinding beam of light shot in from afar, making my vision nearly white with overexposure.
But that moment truly inspired me.
You need a blank "starting point." So I closed my eyes.

Now I can finally tell you. It was the light from the Express. Like a shooting star.
Yours truly,
'Evernight' ♭"

— A voice deep within

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part II
storyItems.text:
"Dear March 7th,

March, the curtain has fallen on the evernight. Rest easy now.

I will track the paths of those you care about.
When you wake up one day, you'll know which ones were worth remembering, and which ones should fade into oblivion.

The shattered girl of a thousand forms could only safely take the journey with your help.
Even so, a similar destiny awaited them: They proclaimed the prophecy of the Flame-Chase to the world, yet most of them withered away in the strife of blood and fire.
...
The Gladius with its beautiful song, together with the flamecrowned Imperator, raised the curtain on the god-slaying act.
Yet those victory celebrations and mutual salvations dispersed like bubbles dancing in the air under the trampling of the gods.
...
If all these years were compiled into a journal of the Flame-Chase Journey, it would surely be adorned with futile words and withered flowers.

But I believe that if you saw it too, you would also bet your life to keep Trailblazing forever for your companions, encountering the unknown frontier countless times.
Just like when you called out to me for help back then, right?

I will use the power of the Remembrance to pacify those sorrowful years.
I will also protect your companions who have yet to arrive, shielding them from the harm of the Memosnatchers.

You've always held unwavering trust in your heart. You trust that your companions would join forces with heroes to rewrite this futile and sorrowful ending.
You trust that the Trailblaze would bring change to every world they've set foot in.

Good night, March.
When you wake up, I hope to give you... a 'future' painted with a beautiful ending. ♭
Yours truly,
'Evernight' ♭"

— A voice deep within

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part III
storyItems.text:
"Dear March 7th,

The night feels so long... Is it because I can't hear your voice?

I'm grateful for your slumber, for it spares you from witnessing the midnight of Amphoreus. These ruins where you first arrived, buried deep with the most ruthless essence of Oblivion.

Endless nightmares surge forth from here, devouring the cosmos... You won't like it.
Just like my past confusion... when trapped by the Remembrance, no new "future" can ever be born.

For thirty million lives, that girl futilely gathered the memories, praying to the deity with authority over the Remembrance beyond the sky.
But those scarred memories, those ripples of memories disguised as "heroic tales," are all just fuel for Destruction... Will they ever amount to anything at all?

But strangely enough, that girl's every move and the stories she tells sometimes remind me of you. You, too, after every journey, would vividly recount your adventure stories and imagine wonderful futures.

You used to say that one day, you'd light the path ahead for everyone with your camera flash.
You once said you'd definitely protect the Express Crew with your "Starshatter: Shard Supreme."
You also said you'd become mature, elegant, and strong, leading everyone forward.

Your wild imagination... every stroke and line is etched into my dormancy.

So... if it were you, how would you embellish a story of an unreachable future?
I have pondered how to keep that girl's "story" from wandering in the endless cycle of years, too... You would naturally do the same, wouldn't you?
But when I peered through the cracks of time to see the beginning and end of this world's memories... I knew that hypocritical sky father had already turned THEIR back on the Amphoreus, setting THEIR gaze toward the Destruction. And THEIR maniacal followers will chase after the afterglow of memories to find you once again...

Even your companions, striders of the Trailblaze — their arrival merely delays the gestation of Destruction—
Our only way out, a thorough "Rain of Sensation," will cleanse all traces of futile agony here. Your companions need only fall into slumber to gain the chance for a new departure.

This "rain" won't last forever. It will wash away all painful memories. Perhaps "Oblivion" is the only exit.
Then, in this journal called Amphoreus, I can finally paste the future you've been yearning for.

Keep your eyes closed, March.
I'll take care of the cruel part ♭

Yours truly,
'Evernight' ♭"

— A voice deep within

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part IV
storyItems.text:
"Dear March 7th,

Dawn is breaking.
I'm grateful that I saw that glimmer of light again in the darkest moment.

They were once the fleeting glimmers of light while I was in my long slumber.
I've dreamed of them in Penacony's surreal memory, marveled at them in the Scalegorge Waterscape, and even the icy storms of Jarilo-VI could not take away their warmth.

Even now, even though I'm about to sink into the familiar night, I can still feel the gaze behind me.
They're waiting for "you."

Maybe I shouldn't have pretended to be convinced by you. Saying I wasn't worried would be a lie. Can you really stand against the tides of Destruction? Can you take care of yourself? Can they protect you? What will you become? Do you have a different answer? Will you regret it?
Will I regret it?
Will I regret it?
Will I regret it?

You've already laid bare every memory before me, holding nothing back. I know that what you call the Trailblaze is a journey that carries the past, connects to the present, and sails forward with courage. It is not a mirage built on a blank page.
I don't know if you'll succeed. But maybe, no matter the end, the only one I can choose now is who you are at this very moment. And the only one I can look toward is the you in the days ahead.

I've also wondered what I should leave for you when I'm gone one day?
Strength. Denial. Identity. Admonition. Habits. Blessing.
But this is your life, and the best gift I can leave you... is a blank canvas for you to paint on your own.
Like the name 'March 7th.' It's unique, yet so fitting.
More importantly, it belongs only to you.

Go forth, March.
Let this unexpected encounter be like a gentle rain that nourishes you.
Paint your blank future with colors that are uniquely yours ♭

Yours truly,
'Evernight' ♭"

— A voice deep within

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part I
storyItems.text:
"Dear March 7th,

Dawn is breaking.
I'm grateful that I saw that glimmer of light again in the darkest moment.

They were once the fleeting glimmers of light while I was in my long slumber.
I've dreamed of them in Penacony's surreal memory, marveled at them in the Scalegorge Waterscape, and even the icy storms of Jarilo-VI could not take away their warmth.

Even now, even though I'm about to sink into the familiar night, I can still feel the gaze behind me.
They're waiting for "you."

Maybe I shouldn't have pretended to be convinced by you. Saying I wasn't worried would be a lie. Can you really stand against the tides of Destruction? Can you take care of yourself? Can they protect you? What will you become? Do you have a different answer? Will you regret it?
Will I regret it?
Will I regret it?
Will I regret it?

You've already laid bare every memory before me, holding nothing back. I know that what you call the Trailblaze is a journey that carries the past, connects to the present, and sails forward with courage. It is not a mirage built on a blank page.
I don't know if you'll succeed. But maybe, no matter the end, the only one I can choose now is who you are at this very moment. And the only one I can look toward is the you in the days ahead.

I've also wondered what I should leave for you when I'm gone one day?
Strength. Denial. Identity. Admonition. Habits. Blessing.
But this is your life, and the best gift I can leave you... is a blank canvas for you to paint on your own.
Like the name 'March 7th.' It's unique, yet so fitting.
More importantly, it belongs only to you.

Go forth, March.
Let this unexpected encounter be like a gentle rain that nourishes you.
Paint your blank future with colors that are uniquely yours ♭

Yours truly,
'Evernight' ♭"

— A voice deep within

"Dear Evernight,

I'm not sure if you can hear me, so I'll just say it in my heart~

You know, I've picked up some of your thoughts, too. You're mysterious and powerful, but I think we're really not that different! You keep saying you want to burn away all the memories, but I bet you remember them even more clearly than I do, right?~
Just between us, I used to daydream about becoming someone like that too... You know, someone really amazing and super elegant!

Thank you for protecting my companions, and thank you for always being there when we needed support!
But we all need to learn to grow up. Look! I just took a big step forward on the road to the future!
I'll keep walking. I'll keep going. One day, we'll both be there to witness "my" past and "my" future!

Yours truly,
'March 7th'"

— A voice deep within
storyItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing the Trailblaze Mission "Gods, Sound the Anthem of Creation"

skills.name: Remembrance, Whirling, Like Rain
skills.skillDesc: This ability automatically selects a target, prioritizing the enemy target that Evernight last attacked. Deals Ice DMG equal to #1[i]% of Evey's Max HP to one enemy. For every #3[i] "Memoria" Evernight currently has, further deals Ice DMG equal to #2[f1]% of Evey's Max HP. After use, Evernight gains #4[i] "Memoria."
skills.simpleSkillDesc: Deals minor Ice DMG to one enemy and further deals minor Ice DMG based on the amount of "Memoria."

skills.name: Solitude, Drifting, In Murk
skills.skillDesc: Evey is immune to Crowd Control debuffs and has an increased chance of getting attacked. While Evey is on the field, Evernight and Evey deal #1[i]% increased DMG.
skills.simpleSkillDesc: The memosprite Evey is immune to <u>Crowd Control debuffs</u>, and its chance of getting attacked increases. While it's on the field, increases its own and Evernight's DMG dealt.

skills.name: Night, Trailing, In Step
skills.skillDesc: When summoned, this unit immediately takes action.
skills.simpleSkillDesc: When summoned, this unit immediately takes action.

skills.name: You, Parting, Beyond Reach
skills.skillDesc: Upon disappearing, increases Evernight's SPD by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>. If the disappearance is due to using "Dream, Dissolving, as Dew," then, for every 1 "Memoria" point consumed by the attack, additionally increases Evernight's SPD by <nobr>#2[i]%</nobr>. Up to <nobr>#3[i]</nobr> "Memoria" points can be taken into account for this. The SPD Boost effect cannot stack and is removed at the start of Evernight's next turn.

skills.name: Dream, Dissolving, as Dew
skills.skillDesc: This ability is used when Evernight's "Memoria" is greater than or equal to #3[i] and she is not affected by Crowd Control. For every 1 "Memoria" point currently held, deals Ice DMG equal to #1[f1]% of Evey's Max HP to the primary target, and Ice DMG equal to #2[f1]% of Evey's Max HP to the other enemy targets. After use, consumes all "Memoria" and HP, and makes Evey disappear.
skills.simpleSkillDesc: Based on the amount of "Memoria", deals massive Ice DMG to the primary target and Ice DMG to the other enemy targets. After use, consumes all "Memoria" and HP, and makes Evey disappear.

name: Evernight
descHash: In the Memory Zone secluded from the world, candlelight reflects the past, silently extinguishing in the mist. Evernight, child of Remembrance emerging from those shadows, the Chrysos Heir who conceals the Coreflame of "Time," raises the waves of "Oblivion" to protect the wishes of those in the mirror "Don't worry, I will guard the path of Trailblaze for you... at any cost. ♭"
